CHAOS.Definition: a state of complete disorder and confusion

EMULATE.Definition: imitate or try to be like

MAINLAND.Definition: main part of the country or territory, not including islands

TENSION.Definition: state of strain, disagreement, or conflict

PROVINCE.Definition: territory or region governed as part of the country

LOOKED DOWN UPON.Definition: considered as unimportant or not worthy of respect

INTENSELY.Definition: with great passion or strong emotion

SCHOLARSHIP.Definition: grant or payment made to support his education

LIBERATED.Definition: freed or set free from oppression or control

OPPRESSORS.Definition: people who exercised authority or treated them cruelly

CAREER-WISE.Definition: in terms of his professional or occupational path or career

LEAVE OF ABSENCE.Definition: period of authorised time away from duty

SYMPATHISE.Definition: understand and share feelings or opinions

SYMPATHISER.Definition: someone who showed sympathy or support

REFUGE.Definition: a place of safety or shelter

MAKE HIS NAME.Definition: become known or establish a reputation

MONARCHIES.Definition: political systems led by a monarch or king/queen

SUFFICE IT TO SAY.Definition: it is enough to say or state

COUNTLESS.Definition: numerous or too many to count

DICTATORSHIP.Definition: a government ruled by a leader with absolute power

PLEBISCITE.Definition: the direct vote of all the members of society

GUILLOTINE.Definition: a device used for cutting people's heads, particularly during the French Revolution

RANKS.Definition: positions in the hierarchy or levels of importance of the armed forces

WELL-OILED MACHINE.Definition: system or organisation that functioned very well

CRITICS.Definition: people who expressed disapproval or unfavourable opinions

COULD DO LITTLE WRONG.Definition: made very few mistakes or errors

EXCEPTION.Definition: case that was excluded from the general statement

DRINKING HIS OWN KOOL-AID.Definition: being too confident or believing in his own ideas without question

HUNCHES.Definition: feelings or guesses that were not based on facts

ASHES.Definition: remains or remnants after a fire

STARVATION.Definition: suffering caused by lack of food

PRIDED HIMSELF.Definition: taken great satisfaction in or been very proud of

CULMINATED.Definition: reached the highest point or climax

MEMOIRS.Definition: written record of personal experiences or reflections

HIS FAIR SHARE OF.Definition: a considerable amount or proportion of

MEGALOMANIAC.Definition: someone obsessed with his own power or importance

EGOMANIA.Definition: the state of considering himself to be very important
